article.title: 3S Group Awarded Contract with Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center for Type 2 Cryptographic Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: 3S Group Incorporated has received an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity, firm-fixed-price contract worth $11.5 million to provide Type 2 Cryptographic Support Services, Certification Authority Workstations peripherals and associated hardware and software for the Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center in Charleston, South Carolina, and all Defense Department services and agencies.
